short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Crystal Maiden: The Frozen Heart of Dota live wallpaper with clock and Google search bar for your new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring the icy elegance of Crystal Maiden to your browser. This live wallpaper blends stunning visuals with practical tools, featuring a built-in clock and a Google search bar for seamless functionality.
